Core.Line: They are cleverer than me. They are richer than me. And most importantly, kinder than me.
It feels good to be honestly vulnerable in front of friends. It feels good to be playfully silly with friends. A good friend can make a dull life a bit more colourful.
Childhood friends seem so carefree. I wonder if that will change when childhood friends and you, yourself, become adults.
I am satisfied with the present. I hope future me will feel the same way. But at the same time, I am afraid of tomorrow.
I hate the feeling of knowing nothing. I hate the feeling of being wronged.
I just hope today will last a bit longer, and tomorrow will never come.
